amendment.description: An amendment numbered 35 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to require the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to complete its Chief's Report for the Brandon Road Study by February 2019.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Joyce (OH) amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Joyce (OH).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Joyce (OH) amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
